message: I think this is a fair split considering your inflation rate. Let's get this over with!
I'm willing to take a smaller share to avoid further negotiation, but I'm not giving up that easily!
This is my final offer, Bob.  I'm willing to compromise, but I need a fair share.  Think about it - we both lose money with each round.
I'm starting to think you're just trying to starve me out with these low offers. Let's see how you like it when the tables are turned!
